scenario_1.persona_desc: This text is likely written by a teacher or educator who specializes in teaching mathematics to students in grades 5-8. The author may have expertise in teaching basic arithmetic, place value concepts, and ordering numbers. The text suggests that the author may be using ordering numbers worksheets with sets of positive whole numbers with different numbers place values to help students struggling with visualizing larger numbers. The author may also be using the mixed place value ordering worksheets to help students understand that 9,999 is smaller than 10,111 even though all those 9’s in the first number might make it seem to be a larger number.

responses.thought: I will choose the option that gives me the most money, which is the same in both scenarios. Since my payout is the same in both scenarios, I will pick the option that gives Person A more money as that is the more equitable thing to do. Therefore, I will choose Right.
